overview: In Thessaloniki in 2021, a city bus of line 05 to Nea Krini has as its sole passenger a girl. She falls asleep on the way and when she wakes up she is in an unknown place. The voice of the announcement of the stops guides her through images of the past. A small film-work that was done very casually during last year's quarantine.

production_companies.name: Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki

tagline: Τhe only thing left of a place of human suffering is a city bus stop.
title: Next Stop: Apolimantiria
